topic.title: What Torrent sites do you like and use the most?
topic.body: What Torrent sites do you like and use the most? I'm referring to sites on Zero but choose others you like, if you like.

topic.title: The Hour of The Pig 1993
topic.body: The Hour of The Pig was a film released in 1993, released in the US as The Advocate. But that version was chopped up by Miramax at the time. Does anyone have an HD copy of this film or a 35mm print?
